hotels.title: Sanya Bay Beachfront Resort with Magnificent Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Picturesque coastlines and palm-fringed beaches await at Crowne Plaza Resort Sanya Bay, an IHG Hotel, a glamorous gateway to the turquoise tides of the South China Sea. Attain peak relaxation as you float in the magnificent pool or bask on sun loungers with a colourful cocktail in hand. As the sun goes down, watch the waves with sand between your toes, sample Cantonese delicacies at Shan Hai Lou restaurant or venture out to get your heart racing at the Love World amusement park.
